hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd ${HOME} mkdir -p test cd test repo init -u https://github.com/technexion-android/manifest -b tn-o8.1.0_1.3.0_8m-ga repo sync --force-sync -j12
source cookers/env.bash.imx8.pico-8m.pi.hdmi merge_restricted_extras
## WIFI ENABLED cp /home/jenkins/output/qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip . unzip qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip cp -rv qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/QCA9377 device/fsl/pico_8m/wifi-firmware/ mv qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/QCA9377 device/fsl/pico_8m_lcd/wifi-firmware/ #sed -i 's/BOARD_HAS_QCA9377_WLAN_FIRMWARE := false/BOARD_HAS_QCA9377_WLAN_FIRMWARE := true/' device/fsl/imx8/pico_8m.mk #sed -i 's/BOARD_HAS_QCA9377_WLAN_FIRMWARE := false/BOARD_HAS_QCA9377_WLAN_FIRMWARE := true/' device/fsl/imx8/pico_8m_lcd.mk
rm -rf qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/ rm -rf qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip
## BT ENABLED cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/nvm_tlv_3.2.bin device/fsl/pico_8m/bluetooth/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/rampatch_tlv_3.2.tlv device/fsl/pico_8m/bluetooth/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/nvm_tlv_3.2.bin device/fsl/pico_8m_lcd/bluetooth/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/rampatch_tlv_3.2.tlv device/fsl/pico_8m_lcd/bluetooth/ sync
cook -j4
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d")
gen_mp_images zip -r "$release_date"_auto_images_hdmi.zip auto_test mv "$release_date"_auto_images_hdmi.zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf auto_test
source cookers/env.bash.imx8.pico-8m.pi.lcd cook -j4
gen_mp_images zip -r "$release_date"_auto_images_lcd.zip auto_test mv "$release_date"_auto_images_lcd.zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf auto_test
#dd if=/dev/zero of="$release_date"_emmc_16G_lcd.img bs=13M count=1024 #kpartx -av "$release_date"_emmc_16G_lcd.img
#loop_dev=$(losetup | grep "emmc_16G_lcd.img" | awk '{print $1}')
#echo "mounted ${loop_dev}"
#(echo n; echo p; echo 1; echo; echo; echo w;) | fdisk ${loop_dev} #sync #flashcard ${loop_dev} #sync #kpartx -d ${loop_dev} #losetup -d ${loop_dev} #sync #mv "$release_date"_emmc_16G_lcd.img /home/jenkins/output/ #sync
